import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import './About.css'; function About() { const [info, setInfo] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { fetch('http://localhost:5000/api/info') .then(res => res.json()) .then(data => setInfo(data.companyInfo)) .catch(err => console.error(err)); }, []); return (

About Us

{info}

); } export default About; /*ACTUALLY I HAVE CHANGED MANY THINGS SEE MY GITHUB FOR THAT AND NOW I WILL SAY MY PLAN LETS DO LIKE THAT 1ST SUMMARY 2ND OUR VALUES 3RD GARRLLY 4TH 2 CARDS WITH CONTENTS 5TH WHY 6TH ESTEMATED CLIENT AND THEN CONTACT US FOR THE SUMMARY THE CONTENT IS Creative Creations Clothing Company was established with a vision to provide best service . We have considerable experience in sourcing and manufacturing of Apperal. “ Creative Creations Clothing Company" probably best defines the philosophy behind starting this apparel Manufacturing. The key differentiator would be in our ability to provide our customers with innovative business models, implementing innovative business processes and providing innovative business offerings and services. All along the promoter of this company with 3 decaeds of industry experience nurtured a dream of taking the ready made garment business across the globe in a systematic and professional manner. This humble beginning is followed by years of hard work, experience, dedication and complete focus on the ever-changing, dynamic market trends and customer requirements. see i need to add a bg image of height 100vh width 100% and align the content as needed then for our values there will be 3 cards 1st card - QUALITY - We deliver the agreed quality every time 2nd card- RELATION - Our sucess is based on good relationship with all our buyers . We belive that undersatnding is a prereqistie for value creation 3rd card - FOCUS - We keep the focus on creating value for our customers and for the group as whole see add more content in each cards and make it big and the card style should be difffrent not the normal one see which will suit for garment manufacturing website then garally this should be auto scorlling from right to left continouesly i wll add the images say me how to add it and then 2 cards which will big the content will be 1st - From conceptualization to production, our comprehensive services cover every aspect of your brand's journey. We have a deep understanding of the intricacies involved in maintaining inventory, managing warehouse charges, and ensuring timely dispatch. Leave these logistical concerns to us while you focus on building your brand's reputation and expanding your market presence. 2nd - Our commitment to your brand goes beyond just manufacturing and warehousing. We believe in fostering long-term partnerships, and therefore, we strive to offer world-class solutions that align with your goals. By collaborating with us, you gain access to a dedicated team that is committed to your brand's success. see you can add more points if you need see the 2 card should be looking different and the content should be big and the card style should be different not the normal one see which will suit for garment manufacturing website and design it professionally then why us here also the cards but sco */
